tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Ramalakshmi with a complaint of broken tooth and was scared of dental treatment. But dr. Ramalakshmi explained me about root canal procedures and was done. And done cap on the tooth.
And in half cost than I expected.
Good and best.
I recommend this clinic for quality and economical treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my two  teeth extracted on the same day with local anaesthesia. It was truly a pain-free experience. Dr Ramalakshmi was very friendly and had immense patience answering all my doubts. And also got implant done. Throughout the treatments Dr Ramalakshmi made me feel very comfortable and made the whole process less scared and easy. Thank you Dr

My wife got Root canal treatment and caps done here.
Dr Ramalakshmi explained about the whole treatment plan very well. During every visit i was explained about the procedure done for the day in detail. Overall experience here was high class and very Good.  I would like to thank Dr Ramalakshmi for her friendly nature & caring.

I went to the here for my tooth pain which was unbearable...Dr.Ramalakshmi explained every detail of my teeth and proper treatment plan....She did RCT without pain and gave me a cap. I recommend you people to visit  once so that u can also experiences the same as me....Thank you Dr.Ramalakshmi for your kind gesture throughout the treatment ....
